title: Ticket #1394: Jobs do not go on hold if exec fails w/ Priv Sep
description:
When running without priv sep, if a job fails to exec (perhaps to a bad shebang for instance), Condor puts the job on hold. This is good.

Unfortunately, if the execute node is using priv sep, it appears that the job just goes back to idle. Fail. :(
remarks:
2013-Jun-04 14:57:03 by tannenba:
As apparently nobody enables privsep except for UW CHTC, dropping priority of this ticket....
creator: tannenba
